name: Aldaron - The Lord of Trees
description:
In "Aldaron - The Lord of Trees," players control an Elf defending the Ancient Tree from evil mushrooms. Players use WASD and mouse to fight off mushrooms until dawn. The game has a Zelda-like gameplay and increases in difficulty with a decreasing health bar for the tree. Beat all 5 levels!

Note: Press Escape to release the mouse and escape again to capture it.
